name: polka-dot hat
notes:
the polka-dot hat is knit in the round using circular or double pointed needles. the construction is simple, it makes it easy to knit, even if you are not used to work with 2 colors.

this pattern includes written instructions and some pictures to help you on the way.


**size**
teen, adult medium and adult large

finished size is about :
* 50 (56, 62) cm / 19.7 (22, 24.5) inches in circumference
* 17,5 (18.5, 19.5) cm / 7 (7.3, 7.6) inches in length.


**yarn & yardage**
you can use any bulky/chunky weight   wool yarn of your liking.  
- 75 (85, 90)  meters / 82 (93, 98.5) yards in c1
- 80 (84, 88) meters / 88 (92, 96) yards in c2 
- (optional) 20-40 for the pompom,   depending on the size you want it to be


**needles**
4.5mm / us 7 circulars with 40cm (16") cable
5mm / us 8 circulars with 40cm (16") cable


**gauge**
19 stitches and 24 rows to 4‚Äù (10cm) in larger size needles


**notions**
knitting in the round, color work, stitch, pompom


have fun !
